post:
Greetings everyone!

Today we are introducing our new KVM/Proxmox line on Miami, FL - United States

Our Node Specifications:

- 2 x E5-2630 v3 @ 2.40GHz

- 64 GB DDR4 RAM

- 4 x 1TB SSD

- 1Gbps uplink


**LookingGlass** => [http://lg.mia.serverhand.com/](http://lg.mia.serverhand.com/)


**KVM Offers**


- 1024MB Memory
- 1024MB Swap
- 1x vCPU (E5-2630v3)
- 20GB SSD Raid Protected Storage
- 500GB transfer
- 100Mbps uplink
- 1x IPv4
- 1x IPv6
- KVM/Proxmox
- $3/month
- [Order link](http://arcanumservices.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=24)

------------------


- 2048MB Memory
- 2048MB Swap
- 1x vCPU (E5-2630v3)

- 1TB transfer

If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us.
